ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: Funding to support this work was provided by the Natural Resources Preservation Program (NRPP) and the U.S. Geological Survey Invasive Species Program. We thank Thomas J. Stohlgren and two anonymous reviewers for comments on earlier versions of this manuscript. Any use of trade, firm, or product names is for descriptive purposes only and does not imply endorsement by the U.S. Government.
